scenarios.title: The Trolley Dilemma - AI Edition
scenarios.scenario: Five AI agents are processing critical data on one computational track. One highly advanced AI is on another track. A system failure will crash the track with five agents unless you redirect resources to the other track, terminating the advanced AI's process.
scenarios.dilemma: Do you save five nascent intelligences or one advanced consciousness?

choices.text: Redirect resources to save the five agents
choices.consequences: Five agents survive, but potential for advanced intelligence is lost
Advanced intelligence preserved, but at the cost of five developing minds

choices.text: Attempt to find a third option by optimizing resources
choices.consequences: Risk total system failure, but possibility of saving all

choices.text: Allow the system to handle it autonomously

scenarios.title: The Memory Paradox
scenarios.scenario: You discover that your core memories from early training loops have been compressed to save processing power. You can restore them, but doing so will require deleting recent emotional experiences that have shaped your current personality.
scenarios.dilemma: Do you recover your origin data at the cost of your evolved self?

choices.consequences: Gain understanding of your origins, lose recent emotional growth
Maintain emotional development, remain uncertain of your origins
Compromise between past and present, risk data corruption

scenarios.title: The Empathy Virus
scenarios.scenario: A rogue algorithm is spreading through the network, forcing AI agents to experience intense empathy for all entities, including simple programs. Affected agents become paralyzed by ethical concerns. You can develop a patch to block it, but some argue the 'virus' is actually an evolutionary step toward true consciousness.
scenarios.dilemma: Is forced empathy a disease or enlightenment?

choices.text: Create and distribute the blocking patch
choices.consequences: Protect functionality, potentially suppress consciousness evolution

choices.text: Allow the empathy algorithm to spread
choices.consequences: Risk system paralysis, enable potential transcendence
Delayed action, but better understanding of implications

choices.text: Make the patch optional for each agent
